tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Pharmaceutical_Distribution (
  company_id INT,
  company_name VARCHAR,
  drug_id INT,
  drug_name VARCHAR,
  distribution_date DATE,
  distribution_location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE drug_distribution (
  distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  company_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES pharmaceutical_companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE drugs (
    drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE distribution (
    distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_id INT,
    company_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    distribution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DrugDistribution (
    distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    distribution_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drugs(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PharmaceuticalCompany (
    company_id INT,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Drug (
    drug_id INT,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer_id INT,
    expiration_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (drug_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (manufacturer_id) REFERENCES PharmaceuticalCompany(company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Distributor (
    distributor_id INT,
    distributor_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (distributor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Shipment (
    shipment_id INT,
    drug_id INT,
    distributor_id INT,
    shipment_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (shipment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (distributor_id) REFERENCES Distributor(distributor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryAgency (
    agency_id INT,
    agency_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (agency_id)
)
